text: Ihalokanlonu mariyu paralokanlonu - mariyu anathalanu gurinci varu ninnu adugutunnaru. Nivu ila samadhanamivvu: "Vari sanksemaniki todpadatame melainadi." Mariyu miru varito kalisi melisi unte (tappuledu), varu mi sodarule! Mariyu cerace vadevado, savarince vadevado allah ku baga telusu. Mariyu allah korite mim'malni kastapetti undevadu. Niscayanga, allah sarvasaktimantudu, maha vivekavantudu
